rationalize

public static Rational rationalize(double x,
                                   double y)
Rationalize returns the simplest rational number differing from x by no more than y. A rational number r1 us simpler than another rational number r2 if r1=p1/q1 and r2=p2/q2 (in lowest terms) and |p1| < |p2| and |q1| < |q2|. Thus 3/5 is simpler than 4/7. Although not all rationals are comparable in this ordering (consider 2/7 and 3/5) any interval contains a rational number in that interval (the simpler 2/5 lies between 2/7 and 3/5).
